articles.author: RT
articles.title: Man vs machine: Russian scientists develop AI that can assess and train human cognitive abilities through simulated combat - Smash Newz
articles.description: Russian researchers have created a computer game which can assess a human player's decision-making speed and their powers of prediction, using trials by combat against an AI-powered opponent.
articles.content:
The team at the Moscow State University of Psychology and Education (MSUPE) sought to measure the human players’ numeracy skills, logical ability, reaction times and predictive intuition while making decisions under rapidly changing conditions.

articles.author: Ashley Strickland, CNN
articles.title: This star survived a close call with a black hole. Eventually, it will become a planet - CNN
articles.description: A red giant star strayed too close to a supermassive black hole in a galaxy 250 million light-years away. Instead of being gobbled up, the star survived -- but it's not in an ideal situation, either.
articles.content: (CNN)A red giant star strayed too close to a supermassive black hole in a galaxy 250 million light-years away. Instead of being gobbled up, the star survived -- but it's not in an ideal situation, either. In a drawn-out process of destruction that leads to a … [+3785 chars]

articles.title: Space weather warning: Earth being hit by solar storm at 1.6 MILLION KM per hour - Express.co.uk
articles.description: EARTH is currently being bombarded by solar winds which are hitting our planet at speeds higher than 1.5 million kilometres per hour.

articles.description: AN ASTEROID as big as a mountain will safely swing past Earth this week. Find out how you can watch the asteroid on the night of the flyby.
